      • GameThread

        public GameThread(java.util.List<Player> players,
                  int xDim,
                  int yDim,
                  int zDim,
                  int winningLength)
        Creates a game with specified dimensions of the board, winning length and random starter.
        Parameters:
        player1 - Player 1
        player2 - Player 2
        xDim - X dimension of the board
        yDim - Y dimension of the board
        zDim - Z dimension of the board, -1 specifies unlimited
        winningLength - Connected pieces required to win the game

      • play

        public void play()
        Runs the game. Game starts with an empty board and finishes when there is a winner or a draw (board is full). If one of the clients is making an invalid move, he is replaced by a Computer player with random strategy. If a computer player tries an invalid move //TODO

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the coordinates, the current player wants to play.

      • informClients

        private void informClients(TowerCoordinates coord,
                           int id)
        Communicates the next moves to all its clients.
        Parameters:
        coord - Coordinates for the next move.
        id - ID of player that executes the move.

      • finalSituation

        private void finalSituation(boolean winning)
        Terminates the game. The final situation is communicated to the players (Win or Draw) and the Server disconnects from the clients.
        Parameters:
        winning -
